I would cure cancer first. Cancer is a devastating disease that affects millions of people worldwide. Curing it would save countless lives and bring hope to so many people who are suffering from this illness.

I would cure Alzheimer's disease. Alzheimer's is a debilitating disease that affects the memory and cognitive abilities of its victims. Curing it would help people retain their memories and live a more fulfilling life.

I would cure diabetes. Diabetes is a chronic disease that affects millions of people worldwide. Curing it would help people manage their blood sugar levels and prevent complications such as blindness, kidney failure, and heart disease.
I would cure heart disease. Heart disease is the leading cause of death worldwide. Curing it would save countless lives and improve the quality of life for millions of people.
I would cure mental illness. Mental illness affects millions of people worldwide and can have a profound impact on their lives. Curing it would help people live a happier and more fulfilling life.
